hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that whenever he left his house, the Prophet (ﷺ) would say:“Bismillah, la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah, at-tuklanu ‘ala Allah (In the Name of Allah, there is no power and strength except with Allah, and trust is placed in Allah).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَدْعُو بِهِ الرَّجُلُ إِذَا خَرَجَ مِنْ بَيْتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication That A Man Should Recite When He Leaves His House
